resources.string: CREATE TABLE "bill" ("txId" CHAR PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL DEFAULT (null), "useNo" VARCHAR DEFAULT 0000 ,"orderDate" CHAR,"orderTime" CHAR,"outOrIn" CHAR,"isPaid" CHAR,"isMealOut" CHAR, "isSpeakOut" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR,"seat" VARCHAR,"feature" VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE "meal" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ,"txId" CHAR NOT NULL ,"name" VARCHAR NOT NULL ,"spcialize" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR DEFAULT (0) ,"number" VARCHAR DEFAULT (0) ,"useNumber" VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE "food" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL , "stateId" VARCHAR,"name" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE "state"("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL ,"name" VARCHAR,"dollar" VARCHAR);
